@brough_joshua @NaturalBAtheist @michellmybell1 @Mr_pastorc @imkimaaron @surgerysleeper @PaulDubuisson @myhighhills @geraldpayne25 @donholtmac @Terrenc58307664 @jools6691 @Megavolt1 @impeachqueen @umfpt @Friendof_Darwin @Canna420Uk @michelpjdejong @malo_j @HazyPeter @LeannEAF @JaTapps @wpcguy @RykerGSD @NelsonMKerr @AnthonyT2_Mufc @htownsmitty @GeorgeGoulet4 @PeterFi98279139 @commonsensejan @Ah_Science @TakeThatDarwin @wendzedin @ScientiaPercept @robster16a @AViRaLAssassin @lindaz333 @Thedukeistheman @SmokeyStafford @HaircutSpock @CitizenFTW @nico_manocchio @AtheistsRead @tklforgiven @tcunderdahl @Janetb172 @badgervindaloo @____Roar____ @OMalleyKaty @kraegkust So the fraud fines, the history of legal bullying, the separating kids, and the continual lying, none of that made the cut.
